text: Moshi Moshi Records is a small London-based independent record label that has released music by the bands such as The Rakes, Bloc Party, Hot Chip, Hot Club De Paris, Kate Nash, Junkboy, Architecture in Helsinki, Tilly and the Wall, Yeti, and its newest release is from a group called Au Revoir Simone. Mates Of State is the Moshi Moshi's 50th release. It is named after the Japanese telephone greeting "Moshi Moshi" (). ==Artists== *Alterkicks (band) *Architecture in Helsinki (band) *Au Revoir Simone (band) *Best Fwends (band) *Bloc Party (band) *Blue Foundation (band) *Break bot (band) *Dananananaykroyd (band) *Dntel (band) *Fans of Kate (band) *Foreign Born (band) *Friendly Fires (band) *The Grates (band) *Hot Chip (band) *Hot Club de Paris (band) *Ingo Star Cruiser (band) *J Xaverre (band) *Junk Boy (band) *Kate Nash *Late of the Pier (band) *Lo-Fi-Fnk (band) *The Mae Shi (band) *Mates of State (band) *Matt and Kim (band) *Matt Harding (band) *Metronomy (band) *New Rhodes (band) *Pedro v Kathryn Williams (band) *The Rakes (band) *Rat:att:agg (band) *Roland Shanks (band) *Slow Club (band) *Sukpatch (band) *Tilly and the Wall (band) *Unsound (band) *Yeti (band) *Zan Lyons (band) ==Related pages== *List of record labels *A side project of the Disco Biscuits ==Other websites== *Official Moshi Moshi Records web site Category:Independent record labels Category:Indie music record labels
title: Moshi Moshi Records
